Add profile preference to SettingsModel
Save the current ammount of profiles as preference
Merge branch 'master' into notification-profile-switcher

Add a next profile button to the notification

The button doesn't do anything right now.

Add functionality to next profile button

The next profile button in the notification will now switch to the next
profile.
Optimize color calculations in ScreenFilterView
Fix bug where notification would stay in OffState

Fix persistent notification bug in PauseState

If the off animation was interrupted and the notification was refreshed
when the filter was transitioning to the pause state, the notification
would be persistent in that following pause state. This is fixed in this
commit by explicitly stopping the service when the filter off animation
is canceled.

Add an intro that opens on first use

The intro can also be opened by pressing the help button in the App
Bar. So far the intro only has one introductionary slide.
